responsibilities: Collaborate with partner teams, such as SRE for site hosting and managing CI/CD pipelines
Collaborate with Data Engineers, Analysts, and other resources to deliver and maintain metrics
Validate technical feasibility of proposed features
Develop and ensure the quality of site features
Create and enhance web-based data visualizations and analytical tools
Implement integrations with existing tools and platforms to extend the functionality of the BI web site
Ensure site availability and address critical issues
Learn and adapt to new technologies and topics as needed
skills: Ability to thrive in a highly collaborative, cross-functional environment
Self-motivated with a passion for operational excellence, quality, and attention to detail
Experience with developing websites by leveraging design systems and React component libraries
Ability to quickly and independently troubleshoot production web application issues
Experience with React, including Next.js, Server Side Components, Lifecycle Hooks
Experience with MongoDB, including Mongoose schemas, pipeline and view creation, query syntax, maintenance
Strong understanding of ETL concepts and tools
Experience implementing and leveraging site traffic reporting and analytics
Experience using D3 for data visualizations
Experience using and releasing open source software in corporate environments, with knowledge of licensing and legal review processes
qualifications: 5+ years professional experience in web development
2+ years professional experience using HighCharts to deliver data visualizations
3+ years professional experience with JavaScript, TypeScript, CSS
Experience working in an Information Security domain (preferred)
